entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 then becoming north 20 early this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 21. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
